name: Thunder God: From Zero
description:
This game is about a person who is cursed by the kunai that found and embarks on an adventure to lift the curse. Even if the cursed person moves, cannot go anywhere but the curse gives a unique skill that interacts with kunais differently.

The game is still developing. Boss puzzle at the end of each chapter, New puzzles along with the continuation of the story. etc... Stay tuned for upcoming content.

The hardest part is thinking about the puzzles. If you have an idea for current levels, upcoming levels, even a full chapter design or other things, please get in touch and share your thoughts. Likewise, you can use the same mail for bugs.

breadheadstudios@gmail.com
